metadata.title: RA Family: How to manually import BSP into E2 studio?

sections.content:
Question:
How to manually import BSP into E2 studio?
Answer:
In E2 studio, Go to Help --> CMSIS Pack Management --> Renesas RA --> and add the package provided.
Suitable Products
AIK-RA6M3
AIK-RA4E1
